albuquerque.neighborhoods: Old Town, Nob Hill, Downtown, North Valley, Uptown, Barelas
albuquerque.meetingHighlights: Active meeting schedule with strong presence in Nob Hill and Old Town; a variety of Big Book and step-study groups.
albuquerque.transitInfo: ABQ RIDE buses serve the city; Albuquerque International Sunport (ABQ) for flights.

roswell.meetingHighlights: Small but steady community with regular hometown meetings and outreach to nearby towns.
roswell.transitInfo: Local bus and regional road access; Roswell International Air Center (ROW) is nearby for limited flights.

santa-fe.neighborhoods: Downtown Santa Fe, Railyard District, Canyon Road, Tesuque, Southside
santa-fe.meetingHighlights: State capital recovery with art community presence; diverse meetings from Plaza area to suburbs; strong Spanish heritage.
santa-fe.transitInfo: Santa Fe Trails bus service; Santa Fe Regional Airport (SAF); high-altitude capital city.

las-cruces.areaDescription: Las Cruces area, Southern New Mexico
las-cruces.neighborhoods: Downtown Las Cruces, NMSU campus, Mesilla Valley, East Mesa
las-cruces.meetingHighlights: College-town recovery near New Mexico State University; bilingual meetings; strong border-region community.
las-cruces.transitInfo: RoadRUNNER Transit buses; Las Cruces International Airport (LRU); I-10 and I-25 junction.
